game.name: Keep on Mining!
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Keep on Mining! 은 짧은 증분형 채굴 게임입니다. 바위를 캐고, 재료를 모으고, 유물을 발견하고, 곡괭이를 제작하며, 거대한 스킬 트리에서 재료를 사용해 영구 업그레이드를 구매하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Keep on Mining! is a short incremental mining game. Mine rocks, gather materials, find artifacts, craft pickaxes and spend your materials on permanent upgrades inside the big skill tree!

reviewHighlights.text: This is the perfect game to watch a show, jam to some music, or listen to an audiobook/podcast. It's a nice incremental game that is pretty decently p...
Keep on Mining is one of those surprisingly addictive games that grabs you from the first few minutes and keeps you digging for “just one more upgrade...
